rules.natural: If the commission held a public hearing on the regulation, then the commission issued a recommendation to the agency.

Under the condition that the commission issued a recommendation to the agency, either the agency granted an exemption to the industry, or if the industry withdrew the appeal in the case, then it is not the case that the industry filed a legal challenge against the regulation.
Either the agency shows leniency toward the industry or the agency acknowledges the industry's cooperation.
Provided that the agency acknowledges the industry's cooperation, the agency does not impose a penalty on the industry.
If the industry has first-time status regarding the violation, then under the condition that the agency shows leniency toward the industry, the agency does not impose a penalty on the industry.
Either the industry has first-time status regarding the violation or the industry made a good faith effort toward compliance.
